Name: Fantasy Adventure
About the game: Introduction Fantasy and Adventure is a hero idle tower defense game. You can upgrade your card heroes and unlock new heroes. How to play Place heroes in the grid, you can merge heroes and generate new heroes randomly The game has 2 play modes, one is qualifying and the other is adventure mode
